posts.title: PM Narendra Modi US visit Live: PM Modi, Donald Trump to hold press conference after meet
posts.description: The meeting between the two leaders comes amid heightened tensions surrounding Trump's trade tariffs on several countries, his controversial Gaza peace plan, and his ongoing mass deportation of illegal immigrants. These issues are likely to feature prominently in their discussions as both leaders seek to strengthen bilateral ties.
